alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:53PM CDT until June 17 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jones County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 1253 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Soso, or near Laurel, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Laurel around 105 PM CDT. Tuckers Crossing around 115 PM CDT. Mill Creek around 130 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
